website_summaries.verdict: This practical pair not only excels in grooming pets, but also works as a handy furniture cleaner.
pros: Bristled side can be used for de-shedding, bathing, and massaging
Flip over, and the fabric can clean pet hair off  furniture
Gloves remove a phenomenal amount of hair
cons: Some customers had trouble getting much hair off short-haired dog breeds

customer_reviews.title: It kinda of works...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Shitzu whom sheds frequently. I'm constantly vacuuming and picking up hair. I thought these gloves would definitely solve the shedding on the carpet. I rubbed his whole body with both gloves and only picks up a few strands. Not like the pictures that a few buyers have posted. Not going to complain much, for the price, it is still a bargain. Maybe I will give it to my sister whom has a big cat.
customer_reviews.author: rferreira

customer_reviews.title: the product looks great
customer_reviews.text: just wanna say the package was completely fine. The gloves are fit to my both hands. It is also easy to remove the hair from my cats, but it seems the performance not that many as the photo as shown. I tried to brush them couple times, but only few pet hairs stick in the gloves. And also, they were not enjoyable this messaging gloves. They just ran away every time I brushed them. It seems the rubber tips are little bit of harder than as I expected. I may try couple more times to see what happened to them.
customer_reviews.author: cathy luk

customer_reviews.title: The dog love them
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good and the dog loves them. The bad part is that although they do lossen and somewhat remove the hair, they don't collect it very well. I take her outside and just allow the hair to blow away. It's nice and pain free but does not replace the regular brush.
customer_reviews.author: Dale C.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I’m theory, these things are a great idea. In actuality, I could have just thrown away what I paid. The hair sticks to everything but the blue pads.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Stephen

customer_reviews.title: No more struggling with my pets!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats, 1 husky and 1 Pomeranian. I tried these on all 4 and have had wonderful experiences. My pom hated being brushed, but loves to be pet, my cats didn't even know they were being brushed. Usually after brushing I'm covered in hair and would change clothes before going out. Now I can just flip the gloves to the opposite side and remove all the hair from my clothing. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Mills

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking, this is not the holy grail of pet hair.
customer_reviews.text: Well, this was a royal waste of money. Maybe they would pick up cat hair if your press super hard, but then you’d be squishing your pet and she would hate you. No, seriously, bad product. Absolutely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Lilia P Nieto

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Dog was scared at first but I showed her it was my hand inside and she calmed down. It removes the hair but I wish the nubs were a little sharper like a normal brush.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Your dogs will love being brushed! You'll love the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great affordable product that works! If your dog does not like being brushed they will now! Seriously 2 of my dogs hate to be brushed! Not anymore they love being brushed now! So I bought 2more pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great product for furry pups
customer_reviews.text: Great product for furry pups! My pup isn’t the furriest but after using these, you realize how much your pup would have shed all over your house. These gloves are gentle and easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a great idea-- not worth the hype and don't work that well. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Treker

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: Not really pulling extra hairs off..more like grooming but since glove is Big it slips off. Sorry..wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JKindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: TWO GLOVES- DOES EXCELLENT JOB OF REMOVING PET HAIR!
customer_reviews.text: SO PLEASED I BOUGHT THEM- PRICE WAS REASONABLE AND IT DOES THE JOB. IT ALSO HAS ON THE BACK OF THE GLOVE SOME FABRIC THAT PICKS UP LOOSE AND FLYING HAIR MAGNETICALLY.
customer_reviews.author: Comparison Shopping  Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They do a great job on the dog hair! I use them everyday....! Shepard and lab!
customer_reviews.author: Iolanthe

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My dog bites of brushed! These trick her into getting groomed without anxiety! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Like any other tool
customer_reviews.text: Worked like any other grooming tool as opposed to how advertised. It barely took of a significant amount and so I would say it was a waste of a buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: simplyhopeful08

customer_reviews.title: are extremely difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.text: They pull the hair off but are extremely difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Catahoula proof
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my big furbaby who sheds like nobody’s business. She loves it it’s like a massage to her and very easy to take the hair off.
customer_reviews.author: Karen cruz

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Makes it so easy to brush my dog!!! My dog doesn’t like to be brushed but this is like I am petting her.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This product just pulled my cats hair and didn't really do the job it said it would do. Cheap and smelly
customer_reviews.author: Terese

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work very well
customer_reviews.text: Don’t work very well. I barely get any hair build ups on it and my animals look at me like I’m crazy when I use it on them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: One cat loves these-long hair (the other short hair cat does not). I am super careful so they don't rip wish they felt more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Galaz

customer_reviews.title: cat and dog hair gone !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the velcro on the wrist to keep mitten snug, got all the hair off my stair finally, the vacuum wasn't doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used much but already know that the dogs like me using it on them and it does take ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used much but already know that the dogs like me using it on them and it does take care of most of their unwanted shed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit is big
customer_reviews.text: They work well but they are super loose and the quality is kind of cheap, but they are good for the price I paid!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. doesn't pick up any hair at all. I have two cats and a dog, tried it on all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Joy

customer_reviews.title: Prob nice for big dogs but for my little pug it ...
customer_reviews.text: Prob nice for big dogs but for my little pug it was too hard to use with all her wrinkles and curled tail. Something smaller may be best. Reverse sode works great on my sway couch!
customer_reviews.author: Jrbbe

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like them better than a brush.
customer_reviews.text: These are OK. They don't pick up as much hair as I expected. But, the dogs like them better than a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Gunona

customer_reviews.title: They fit fine, and the quality is decent
customer_reviews.text: Works great for both removing hair from furniture and loose fur from shedding pets! Definitely would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Nyota Sungura

customer_reviews.title: do not waste your money!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product came in quickly, but does not work!! at allllll!!! We have an Australian Sheppard, Shorkie, And a cat. It did not work on any of our pets. At best all it did was brush them, but as far as removing any loose hair, that was a no-go. I only gave 1 star because I could not give 0.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Boney

customer_reviews.title: Gathers hair very well!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Cats love it and think it's just getting then when I'm actually gathering copious amounts of hair. Also great to use on cloth furniture using the reverse side of the glove. Good value too
customer_reviews.author: Russ G.

customer_reviews.title: Made well!
customer_reviews.text: My cat will stand for grooming with this glove. Seems to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: Girlscoutmom7

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't work as well as expected, the hair goes all over the floor & not on the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Starr

customer_reviews.title: The dog and its owner seems to enjoy.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a dog and gave this as a gift. The dog and its owner seems to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable way to brush your pet!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use during playtime with the family! They actually work too!
customer_reviews.author: Sage M. Garretson

customer_reviews.title: Does the dog groomers knows what’s best for your dog?
customer_reviews.text: A dog groomer recommended that I should use a deshedding brush glove on my pug cause they shed a lot. So I decided to get this type because the price was reasonable. I’m still testing the capabilities of these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Came in quick does its job, i ended up tearing mine but that was y own fault. It is good if you take care of it. Feels kind of cheaper compared to the target brand one but it does the job just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pair for
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and doesn’t work like Instagram. Just makes a mess of hair
customer_reviews.author: Reviewed

customer_reviews.title: I love these! Both of my dogs have short hair
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Both of my dogs have short hair, but these still work great and the dogs love being brushed with them. I would hands down recommend these to any pet owners
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: This is comparable to the higher priced doggie gloves do.
customer_reviews.text: This does the job that high priced doggie gloves do. My dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: CLAIRACE

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: It’s like a massage for your dog and gets rid of the loose hair.
customer_reviews.author: Cass S

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it and my cats did as well! It didn't remove as I thought but it did remove enough.
customer_reviews.author: Karlo Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Works good for topcoat deshedding on my thick coat lab mix
customer_reviews.text: Works good for topcoat deshedding on my thick coat lab mix. Made using the deep coat brush much easier.
customer_reviews.author: G2

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: After 2 uses it made holes of each hand. Not durable at all with low quality. Unless I had a bad set. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Member since 2013

customer_reviews.title: It is good at shower
customer_reviews.text: It is a shower glove, not work on the daily.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Good value product. I was actually surprised to realize that it's grooming gloves (plural) and not just a single glove. I haven't used it a ton but with some work it takes the hair off my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jalkio

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, really effective on short hairs and on the furniture too.
customer_reviews.author: S McCrory

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean after use, didn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t really help for my dog and rather difficult to clean after use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. I tried this on my dog that sheds a lot and it removed very little. I wouldn’t even give it 1 star if it wasn’t required.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and the price is a steal
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my huskie puppies and I thought maybe it wouldn’t do too good being that they shed like crazy . But thee grooming gloves are awesome and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: susan rivera

customer_reviews.title: We love this product
customer_reviews.text: Awesomely durable gloves. Dog gets super excited just at the sight of the gloves. Considerably less shedding and nice shiny, healthy coat results. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: catrisha

customer_reviews.title: not real effective for pets that are already fairly well-groomed
customer_reviews.text: nubs too far apart and weak to to get much hair off of my cats
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect size and work great on my short haired puppies.
customer_reviews.author: $$DEJAVU$$

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves to be pet with these! He normally will not sit still for us to brush him so these are a great alternative.
customer_reviews.author: caity

customer_reviews.title: We're happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work well for are shedding dog and is also helpful for picking up hair throughout the house and in our cars very cool product
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: It’s aight
customer_reviews.text: I thought the fur could be easier to get off the glove but it did work.
customer_reviews.author: Isela Resendiz

customer_reviews.title: Good for a shedding puppy
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is loosing her puppy coat so this comes in handy to remove all the shedding hair.
customer_reviews.author: SSand

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: really good product! So convenient! My two friends love that!
customer_reviews.author: JING GAO
